title: Accelerating carrier separation to boost the photocatalytic CO2 reduction performance of ternary heterojunction Ag–Ti3C2Tx/ZnO catalysts
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13719-13733
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01985G, Paper

Qilin Han, Zhiyao Wu, Yu Zhou, Yongxin Lei, Bingying Nie, Leilei Yang, Wenbin Zhong, Nannan Wang, Yanqiu Zhu
Developing low-cost and efficient photocatalyst/co-catalyst systems that promote CO2 reduction remains a challenge.
